project_descr: The overall objective of the project is to contribute to early recovery, resilience and social cohesion of targeted local communities. The project also contributes to prevention of terrorism, violence and radicalisation.

outputs.output_descr: Improved conflict prevention and resolution skills of communities for land conflict and other potential conflict issues involving IDPs/returnees/refugees and local communities
donor_name: UN Tr Fund for Human Security

outputs.output_descr: Emergency management mechanisms, including disaster risk reduction and response plans established and functional in targeted localitie
donor_name: UN Tr Fund for Human Security

project_title: community empowerment and human security in the f north
